title: Website & Community Takeover
desc: Shared hub for lore, memes, coordination. Claim roles, co-create the movement.

title: DEX Vault → Community Barometer
desc: Heartbeat over hype. On-chain signal for genuine support and activity.

title: Schill Phase → Pulse over Push
desc: Build quiet; vibe loud. No new drops yet to keep curiosity and incentives alive.

title: Creator Fee Distribution
desc: 50% Locks+Burn · 30–35% Growth/Market · 15–20% Dev Ops (staged locks; unlocks burn).

title: Tool Development → Controlled Fire
desc: Spark releases: Pumpkin Patch first; Oracle & Candle Carver follow.

title: Community-First Tool Vision
desc: Co-create real utility + fun; iterate with real user feedback.
